The greatest competitive game out there yet through valve's terrible execution they find a way to ruin it. Terrible anti cheat, horrible match making to the point where even intermediate players are forced to use third party matchmaking. Finally there is overwatch the most illogical and counter intuitive concept in video game history, they give low level players the ability to perma ban people without any system of appeals. Better yet bans given out by overwatch automatically turn into vac bans after a few weeks. Thanks to this system a few gold novas were able to rob me of over a thousand dollars, and over 2500 hours of game time.
pretty fun even though im bad

Played this game active for a long time, stopped playing for a long time because of all the hackers, came back like a year later and nothing changed but the skins.

Edit: Played the game for additional 71 hours and steam asked me to update my review, so here i am: Still bullshit
